nodes.text: The Zugga Challenge was a podracing course located on Mon Gazza. Between the years 4 and 34 ABY, the Spice Runners of Kijimi carried out a heist on Mon Gazza, during which they were forced to outrun a New Republic patrol through the old Zugga Challenge course.

The Zugga Challenge was mentioned canonically in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo. The Zugga Challenge was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via Star Wars Episode I: Racer, a 1999 LucasArts video game.
